name: Circled - Avoid spikes in circle
description:
Circled is an arcade game where you have to drag and rotate a circle which contains dangerous spikes.Don't let the ball inside touch the spikes!

Features

  • Collect money
  • Buy new skins for ball
  • Climb higher in leaderboards
  • Unlock achievements
  • Buy lenny face ball ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
